      • featureIterator

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • featureStore

        public static org.geotools.data.AbstractDataStore featureStore(org.geotools.data.FeatureSource originalSource,
                                                               java.lang.String path,
                                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<?>> attributeTypes)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new Feature Store for writing features
        Parameters:
        originalSource - the original feature source, used for bounds and geometry descriptor information
        path - the location where the store will be saved
        attributeTypes - a map of attribute information (name, type) to create the schema
        Returns:
        an empty store for writing features
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be created
